newsitem.title: ITALY: SOCCER-LAZIO DEFENDER NESTA OUT FOR SIX WEEKS.
newsitem.headline: SOCCER-LAZIO DEFENDER NESTA OUT FOR SIX WEEKS.

text.p: Lazio's Italian international Alessandro Nesta will be out for six weeks after suffering a leg injury in a World Cup qualifier at the weekend, the club said on Tuesday.

Claudio Bartolini, the Rome side's doctor, said the defender had pulled muscles in his right thigh in the game against Moldova on Saturday. He needed 15 days complete rest and would not be fully match fit until mid-May.
Bartolini said Nesta would miss all but the final four matches of the serie A season. Lazio are sixth in the league and fighting for a UEFA Cup place next season.
